Pop pevka zavita v žalost, ubili so ji bratranca
Na instagramu prosi za informacije.
01 Nov 2019, 19:28 by Ma. M.



Nicole Scherzinger FOTO: Instagram



Johna je zbil avto do smrti. FOTO: Instagram


Nekdanja glavna pevka skupine Pussycat Dolls in žirantka v oddaji X Factor Nicole Scherzinger (41) je zavita v žalost. Minulo soboto je namreč ostala brez bratranca Johna Fredericka (35), ki ga je neznani voznik srebrnega hyundaia sonate zbil do smrti na ulici v floridskem Fort Lauderdalu in odpeljal s kraja nesreče.


Johna je zbil avto do smrti. FOTO: Instagram

Na instagramu je Nicole napisala: »Prava nočna mora je, da se bratranec John nikoli več ne bo zbudil. S težkim srcem se poslavljam od njega.« Vse sledilce je tudi prosila, naj ji sporočijo, če vedo kaj o tej nesreči. »Moj dragi bratranec, rada te imam,« je končala zapis.
text:
A pop singer wrapped in grief, they killed her cousin
Ask on instagram for information.
01 Nov 2019, 18:28 by Ma. M.



Nicole Scherzinger PHOTO: Instagram



John crashed his car to death. PHOTO: Instagram


Former lead singer of the Pussycat Dolls and X Factor Guitarist Nicole Scherzinger, 41, is saddened. Last Saturday, she lost her cousin, John Frederick, 35, who was beaten to death on a street in Florida's Fort Lauderdale by an unknown driver of a silver sonata hyundai.


John crashed his car to death. PHOTO: Instagram

On instagram, Nicole wrote: “It is a real nightmare that Cousin John will never wake up again. My heart goes out to him. ”She also asked all followers to let her know if they knew anything about the accident. "My dear cousin, I love you," she finished the record.
